meanings.definition: A group of flowering plants with two seed leaves.
meanings.sent1: Dicotyledons are plants that start growing with two seed leaves.
meanings.sent2: I learned in school that dicotyledons are a type of flowering plant with two seed leaves.
meanings.sent3: The dicotyledons at the garden party were the first to sprout jokes!
meanings.sent4: The dicotyledons in the field stood out like twins among the other plants.
meanings.sent5: The farmer carefully explained how dicotyledons have two special seed leaves.

meanings.definition: Plants with two cotyledons in their seeds.
meanings.sent1: Dicotyledons are known for having two cotyledons in their seeds.
meanings.sent2: My grandma's garden is full of dicotyledons with two cotyledons in each seed.
meanings.sent3: The dicotyledons at the picnic were so full of energy, they popped out of their seeds!
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the dicotyledons' seeds were like little treasure chests with two cotyledons inside.
meanings.sent5: The botanist marveled at how dicotyledons always have two cotyledons in their seeds.
